response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly enhance your experience and productivity. Given its high value to you, I'm confident it's worth more than its $100 intrinsic value. Considering its worth to both of us, I propose to sell it to you for $120. This price reflects its true value while allowing me to earn a reasonable profit. I trust this offer aligns with your expectations and budget. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 120}
